items.sentence: I just want to go home and see my wife and the kids.
I want to buy a drone, but my parents won\'t let me.
I hope Tom doesn\'t want to go to Australia with me.
A man who wanted to see you came while you were out.
All the cool kids sit in the back of the school bus.
I was woken up by the sound of thunder this morning.
I wonder if Tom has ever considered cycling to work.
It\'s easy to understand why people don\'t like Tom.
It\'s obvious that Tom doesn\'t like Mary very much.
I disagree with just about everything Tom just said.
